Text: thx a lot mate, always used the free version but wanted to try out the paid one. what's the difference?

Didn't work for me. Said serial was invalid after I reconnected to the internet. It reverted me back into trial mode. Pretty sure I did everything right. Might have been because I had an old version that I had to uninstall. My firewall never picked up on Adobe phoning home either.
hi Ching, downloading the files, then AVG stopped me from downloading as it said there are Viruses. What's happening?

The problem is that everytime you go on line the serial gets blacklisted so I have to enter a new one. Only way is a patch or a crack to get around this. I went back to vers 10.0 which has a patch and it works with no problem

It's Work Perfectly
